name: Breckin Meyer
description:
What kind of a name is Breckin Meyer?

Wait, who is this Breckin Meyer, anyway?

Wasn't he in Clueless? Yeah, pretty sure he was in Clueless?

And didn't he headline that show on NBC for a while? No, not Inside Schmidt...

Inside Schwartz! That's it, Inside Schwartz! That lasted all of 13 episodes. Geez!

It's somewhat telling that our recollection of Breckin Meyer is a movie from three decades ago, where he is what, 7th or 8th billed, and a TV show from two decades ago which, again, lasted 13 episodes!

Apparently, he was also in the Garfield movies. Both of them. He was NOT the cat...

And played a lawyer on some show opposite Zach Morris? Sure, that's something!

So, back to the original question, what kind of a name is Breckin Meyer?

Well, Meyer is a perfectly cromulent last name, could be Jewish or goyishe, in this case, Jewish, actually...

Oh, Breckin! You want to know what kind of a name is Breckin!

We have no idea.
